scripts.build:docker: docker build -t danielwpz/bh-alert:$npm_package_version . && docker tag danielwpz/bh-alert:$npm_package_version danielwpz/bh-alert:latest
scripts.publish:docker: docker push danielwpz/bh-alert:$npm_package_version && docker push danielwpz/bh-alert:latest
scripts.preversion: which aws && which docker && which nomad
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm run build:docker && npm run publish:docker && npm run deploy
